vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Address.isContract (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#208-221) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function transfer(IERC20 token, address to, uint256 amount) public onlyPrimary {

        token.transfer(to, amount);
vulnerability_findings.message:
__unstable__TokenVault.transfer (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#759-761) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,amount) (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#760)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor (uint256 rate, address payable wallet, IERC20 token) public {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.rate (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#404) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#441-443)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor (uint256 rate, address payable wallet, IERC20 token) public {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.wallet (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#404) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.wallet (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#434-436)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor (uint256 rate, address payable wallet, IERC20 token) public {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.token (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#404) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#427-429)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor.openingTime (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#583) shadows:
	- TimedCrowdsale.openingTime (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#596-598)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor.closingTime (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#583) shadows:
	- TimedCrowdsale.closingTime (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#603-605)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#583-591) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(openingTime >= block.timestamp,TimedCrowdsale: opening time is before current time) (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#585)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#610-613) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#612)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#619-622) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#621)

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
Address.isContract uses assembly (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#208-221)
	- PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#219

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:

vulnerability_findings.name: External Call To User-Supplied Address (SWC 107)
vulnerability_findings.message:
A call to a user-supplied address is executed.
An external message call to an address specified by the caller is executed. Note that the callee account might contain arbitrary code and could re-enter any function within this contract. Reentering the contract in an intermediate state may lead to unexpected behaviour. Make sure that no state modifications are executed after this call and/or reentrancy guards are in place.
Classification: SWC-107
